meanings.sent1: The nickelic coating on the metal made it shiny.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace had a beautiful nickelic charm.
meanings.sent3: The nickelic paint on the car sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The nickelic sheen of the jewelry caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The nickelic color of the coin was distinct and bright.

meanings.sent1: The nickelic alloy was strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The nickelic components of the machine were essential for its function.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally swallowed a nickelic screw while working on the project.

meanings.sent1: The nickelic rock had a silver-like shine.
meanings.sent2: The nickelic paint color matched the shade of nickel perfectly.
meanings.sent3: His nickelic watch looked like a miniature version of a nickel coin.
